scripts.build-dev: bun run tsc --noEmit && babel src --extensions '.ts,.js' --out-dir build && node copy-files.mjs manifest.json
scripts.build-prod: bun run tsc --noEmit && babel src --extensions '.ts,.js' --out-dir build-prod && node copy-files.mjs manifest.prod.json
scripts.build: bun run build-dev && bun run build-prod && bun run zip-prod
